search_results.title: Nicholas Wade: Journalist & Science Author, Speaker
search_results.snippet: Nicholas Wade is a British-born scientific reporter, editor, and author who currently writes for the Science Times section of The New York Times.

search_results.title: Wade - Wade Davis
search_results.snippet: ABOUT WADE. Wade Davis is Professor of Anthropology and the BC Leadership Chair in Cultures and Ecosystems at Risk at the University of British Columbia.
